Override.Items: <!-- 衣服基准 --> <!-- 英文名中文名作品名 --> <!-- 英文名中文名衣服 --> <Item identifier="ERWA_英文名_Cloth" category="Equipment" cargocontaineridentifier="crate_endfield" tags="smallitem,clothing" scale="0.5" impactsoundtag="impact_soft"> <PreferredContainer primary="crewcab" /> <!-- 前哨站售卖 --> <Price baseprice="800" canbespecial="true" displaynonempty="false"> <Price storeidentifier="merchantoutpost" multiplier="1.1" sold="false" /> <Price storeidentifier="merchantmine" multiplier="1.0" sold="false" /> <Price storeidentifier="merchantresearch" multiplier="1.0" sold="false" /> <Price storeidentifier="merchantmilitary" multiplier="1.0" sold="false" /> <Price storeidentifier="merchantcity" multiplier="1.0" sold="false" /> <Price storeidentifier="merchantarmory" multiplier="1.0" sold="false" /> <Price storeidentifier="merchantmedical" multiplier="1.0" sold="false" /> <Price storeidentifier="merchantengineering" multiplier="1.0" sold="false" /> <Price storeidentifier="merchant_endfield" multiplier="1.0" sold="true" minamount="1" maxamount="2" /> </Price> <!-- 分解产物 --> <Deconstruct time="2"> <Item identifier="ballisticfiber" amount="1" /> </Deconstruct> <!-- 槽位中外观 --> <InventoryIcon name="英文名_Cloth_Icon" texture="%ModDir%/Content/Items/Clothings/作品名/OutfitIcons_作品名序号.png" sourcerect="0,0,128,128" origin="0.5,0.5" /> <!-- 地面上外观 --> <Sprite name="英文名_Cloth_Drop_Sprite" texture="%ModDir%/Content/Items/Clothings/作品名/英文名_Cloth_Sprite_Drop.png" sourcerect="0,0,0,0" depth="0.5" origin="0.5,0.5" /> <!-- 地面上物理效果 --> <Body width="100" height="50" density="30" friction="0.8" restitution="0.01" /> <!-- 穿着效果 --> <Wearable slots="Any,InnerClothes" msg="ItemMsgPickUpSelect"> <!-- 外观 --> <sprite limb="Torso" texture="%ModDir%/Content/Items/Clothings/作品名/英文名_Cloth_Sprite.png" hidelimb="false" hideotherwearables="false" inheritsourcerect="true" inheritorigin="true" inheritscale="true" inheritlimbdepth="true" depthlimb="None" /> <sprite limb="RightArm" texture="%ModDir%/Content/Items/Clothings/作品名/英文名_Cloth_Sprite.png" hidelimb="false" hideotherwearables="false" inheritsourcerect="true" inheritorigin="true" inheritscale="true" inheritlimbdepth="true" depthlimb="None" /> <sprite limb="RightForearm"
